title: Digital twin and extended reality
content:
Hiii seniors!!

Anyone please let me know how is 
Digital twin and extended reality subject...in terms of syllabus and assignment workload
Marks scheme is 30 Isa and 20 assignments

And is this easy subject compared to Blockchain???

comments.body: Just adding to the question do I need to know ARVR for it?
Preferred not mandatory afaik, unit 1 and 2 would cover all the basics you'd need from arvr
